item.title: British Museum's Big China Show Treads on Tricky Ground
item.description: British Museum’s China Exhibition Treads on Tricky Ground The British Museum is hosting a major exhibition of Chinese art, but the show has been met with criticism from some Chinese scholars who say it does not do enough to address the country’s colonial past.
